review: I've only had it a week but my first impression is very positive.  It provides easy access to my Prime instant video watch list which is the main reason I purchased it.  Some movies are cheaper than my Comcast OnDemand.  The remote is easy to use, very comfortable, and much better than my Apple TV remote.  I have mine hooked up to a cat7 cable so it's a pretty high speed connection and as expected the picture definition is really good and comparable to my cable signal.  The only annoying features so far are: the long video that you have to watch upon set up and there's no sleep button so I feel like I'm wasting energy.  If you didn't have cable this would be a must have!  We plan on taking it with us on vacation.
author: N. R. "amazon shopper"
